configuration.name: widget_048791583048897125
configuration.stem:
Collaborate  To study as a group, choose one of the study guide statements to present to the class. Make sure your presentation incorporates the evidence and reasoning that support the statement. Be creative! Consider using one of the following formats:
•	create a multimedia presentation
•	perform a play
•	record a story using a real-world example
•	make a poster
•	create a diorama
